posts.post_content: Longtime lurker, first post.  I’m looking to buy T206s (lower value) in raw condition that would grade in the 2-3 range.  I’m not looking to grade, just giving a general idea of the condition I’m looking for. Not interested in major creases, paper loss, hand writing, stamping or significant staining.  Would prefer to buy in quantity, but okay with single purchases.  Right now I only have 20, so not sure if I’m going to make a run at the set, sans the BIG 4.  I have a ton of feedback on eBay and Blowout forums if needed.  I’m still getting my feet wet with this set/chase so please forgive any ignorance on my end.  Thanks!
One deal done… looking for more!  I’m easy to work with and paying strong :)

I have a Krause Portrait Piedmont that was snapped out of an SGC 4.5 holder, it  has excellent eye appeal and I think is priced fairly for the condition and what recent cards have sold for on ebay in similar grades.

[url]https://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=319523[/url]

I think that is a great price for the condition!  Unfortunately, maybe a little too nice for the overall condition of the set I’m putting together.  Thanks for checking with me though.  

[quote name="53toppscollector" post=2228089]I have a Krause Portrait Piedmont that was snapped out of an SGC 4.5 holder, it  has excellent eye appeal and I think is priced fairly for the condition and what recent cards have sold for on ebay in similar grades.

[url]https://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=319523[/url][/QUOTE]
Another deal done… still looking!  Now open to scarce backs, raw or graded, and lower valued graded HOF.
A few more deals done… still looking!  Have a little more than 50 now and trying to get to 100 soon!
